    • draw

      void draw​(int type) throws IOException
      Draws the menu into the given screen. Type 1 = Starting Menu. Type 2 = Pause Menu. Type 3 = Instructions Menu.
      Parameters:
      type - type of menu to draw.
      Throws:
      IOException - .
